import React, { Component } from "react"; export default class Product extends Component{ state ={id:this.props.id,name:this.props.name, price:this.props,t} render() { return ( // receiving info from parent class to child class
Product #{this.props.id}
{this.props.productName}
${this.props.price}
{this.props.quantity}
{this.props.children}
) } }
